programme.title: Cool it, Man!
programme.short_synopsis: Floods in Europe remind Alistair Cooke of the damage done to Dresden during WWII.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke talks about floods in Europe; Dresden damage during WWII; air conditioning & the heatwave; forest fires; floods in Mississippi.
